ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscmet3i.2 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 |  | iscmet3i.3 | |- D e. ( Met ` X ) |
| 3 |  | iscmet3i.4 | |- ( ( f e. ( Cau ` D ) /\ f : NN --> X ) -> f e. dom ( ~~>t ` J ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nnuz | |- NN = ( ZZ>= ` 1 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_1zzd | |- ( T. -> 1 e. ZZ ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( T. -> D e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 1, 5, 6 | #P_iscmet3 | |- ( T. -> ( D e. ( CMet ` X ) <-> A. f e. ( Cau ` D ) ( f : NN --> X -> f e. dom ( ~~>t ` J ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_trud | |- ( D e. ( CMet ` X ) <-> A. f e. ( Cau ` D ) ( f : NN --> X -> f e. dom ( ~~>t ` J ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3 | #P_ex | |- ( f e. ( Cau ` D ) -> ( f : NN --> X -> f e. dom ( ~~>t ` J ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mprgbir | |- D e. ( CMet ` X ) |
